t=int(raw_input())
for i in xrange(t):
    a,b,c,d=map(int,raw_input().split())
    a2,b2,c2,d2=map(int,raw_input().split())
    ans=((c-a)*(d-b))+((c2-a2)*(d2-b2))
    r3x1=max(a,a2)
    r3y1=max(b,b2)
    r3x2=min(c,c2)
    r3y2=min(d,d2)
    
    if r3x1<r3x2 and r3y1<r3y2:
        ans-=((r3x2-r3x1)*(r3y2-r3y1))
    print ans
